mean_cn: adv. 在后，回原处，退回；  n. 背部
mean_en: the rear part of the body :the part of the body that is opposite to the stomach and chest and that goes from the neck to the top of the legs
deformation_desc: K的图形代表着播放设备上的回退/回放键。
sentence: His back hurt, but he felt better after a back massage.
sentence_trans: 他的背很疼，但是做了个背部按摩就好多了。
